description.ko: 모든 빛의 파편 속에 담긴 순수한 에너지와 숨겨진 무지개를 찬양합니다.
description.en: The celebration of pure energy and the hidden rainbow contained within every shard of light.

prompt: A hyper-complex glass nautilus shell being pierced by a concentrated laser, exploding into a chaotic yet beautiful web of rainbow-colored light refractions and sharp spectral shards. Intense spectral dispersion, refractive indices, and chromatic aberration at the crystal facets. 8k, hyper-realistic, raytracing. Sharp macro focus on the points where light splits into pure energy. Global illumination and cinematic lighting capture the prismatic energy and the rainbow-saturated atmosphere.
